about: Driven by a passion for innovation, I am a highly motivated computer engineering professional with a Bachelor of Engineering from Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology. My expertise lies in designing and implementing robust software solutions, with a strong focus on machine learning, automation, and optimizing complex systems. I excel at leveraging cutting-edge technologies to develop intelligent tools and enhance efficiency, consistently seeking to apply analytical thinking and a curious mindset to solve challenging problems.

experience.description: Designed APIs to simulate hardware behavior and accelerate feature validation for network nodes.
Orchestrated multi-agent LLM systems and developed intelligent image-processing tools.
Distilled and fine-tuned GPT-2 for efficient query solutions.

projects.name: Smart Tutor
projects.description: A multi-agent AI tutor system that specializes in academic subjects, Built with Google's Agent Developent Kit and Gemini.

projects.name: TalkToDoc
projects.description: Modular LLM based system that allows users to interact with over 20 types of documents, understand their content, and extract information.

projects.name: PlanAndEval
projects.description: An implemen tation of the Plan-and-Execute AI agent pattern using LangGraph. This system breaks down complex tasks into manageable steps, executes them sequentially, and adapts the plan based on intermediate results.

blogs.title: Friendship over with Attention. Now FNet is my best friend
An honest Guide to Optimize LLMs for upto 10x Inference
